data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Niu, Minmin, Feng, Jinian (2018): A new species of Parlatoria from China (Hemiptera, Coccomorpha, Diaspididae). ZooKeys 779: 147-155, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.779.27437, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.779.27437
